stripped_text: When your turn begins or you steal an agenda, place 1 credit on this resource. Spend hosted credits to play events. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must trash 1 card from your grip at random or trash this resource.
text:
When your turn begins or you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
Spend hosted credits to play events.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must trash 1 card from your grip at random or trash this resource.
title: Mystic Maemi
